channel.title: Chinese on cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in Chinese on cookbook

item.title: General Tso's Chicken
item.description: Ingredients Chicken 1 1/2 lbs chken thighs 1 cup all purpose flour 1 cup cornstarch 1 tsp baking powder 1 tsp salt 3 Tbsp marinade Chicken Marinade 2 egg whites 3 tbsp dark soy sauce 3 tbsp chinese cooking wine 3 tbsp vodka 1/4 tsp baking soda

item.title: Orange Chicken
item.description: Ingredients Basic Tempura Chicken 3/4 cup cornstarch 1 1/2 cup all-purpose flour 1 egg 1 cup + 2 tbsp water 1/4 cup vodka 2 tsp salt 1 1/2 lb boneless and skinless chicken thighs 72 oz peanut oil Basic Orange Sauce Oleo Saccharum 6 Oranges 1 cup sugar
